sentence.text: We identified a homozygous frameshift mutation in biological_process (c.467delC; p.(P156Hfs*33)) by a combination of linkage analysis and Whole Exome Sequencing in a consanguineous Turkish family with a 9-year-old boy affected by early onset cerebellar ataxia and mild ID.
So far, homozygous or compound heterozygous mutations in biological_process have been identified in two Turkish siblings and a Dutch girl, respectively, affected by cerebellar ataxia and ID.
